text:
Currently socket_bucket_read assumes that the socket it has is connected.  
While with accept()ed incoming stream sockets this is a safe assumption, this 
won't work with UDP non-connected sockets, for example

Created attachment 20765
allow socket_bucket_read to work with non-connected sockets

patch to more aggressively test socket connected-state for non-stream sockets
and use recvfrom if the socket isn't connected
